title: Provable Advantage of Parameterized Quantum Circuit in Function Approximation. (arXiv:2310.07528v1 [quant-ph])
abstract: Understanding the power of parameterized quantum circuits (PQCs) in accomplishing machine learning tasks is one of the most important questions in quantum machine learning. In this paper, we analyze the expressivity of PQCs through the lens of function approximation. Previously established universal approximation theorems for PQCs are mainly nonconstructive, leading us to the following question: How large do the PQCs need to be to approximate the target function up to a given error? We exhibit explicit constructions of data re-uploading PQCs for approximating continuous and smooth functions and establish quantitative approximation error bounds in terms of the width, the depth and the number of trainable parameters of the PQCs. To achieve this, we utilize techniques from quantum signal processing and linear combinations of unitaries to construct PQCs that implement multivariate polynomials. translated_title: 可证明参数化量子电路在函数逼近中的优势
translated_abstract: 理解参数化量子电路（PQCs）在完成机器学习任务中的能力是量子机器学习中最重要的问题之一。本文通过函数逼近的视角分析了PQCs的表达能力。以往对于PQCs的普适逼近定理主要是非构造性的，由此引发了以下问题：PQCs需要多大才能以给定误差逼近目标函数？我们展示了数据重新上传PQCs的显式构造，用于逼近连续和平滑函数，并建立了PQCs的宽度、深度和可训练参数数量的定量逼近误差界限。为了实现这一目标，我们利用了量子信号处理和酉线性组合的技术来构造实现多元多项式的PQCs。我们使用伯恩斯坦多项式和局部泰勒近似技术实现全局和局部逼近方法。
tldr: 通过分析参数化量子电路在函数逼近中的表达能力，本论文展示了数据重新上传PQCs的显式构造及其对连续和平滑函数逼近的定量误差界限。
en_tdlr: This paper examines the expressivity of parameterized quantum circuits (PQCs) in function approximation and provides explicit constructions of data re-uploading PQCs for approximating continuous and smooth functions. It establishes quantitative approximation error bounds in terms of the width, depth, and number of trainable parameters of PQCs.
